title: Miihaa Paradise
sinopse:
Thanks to her friend Mari, school girl Narumi is introduced to the world of visual rock. She is immediately enthralled by the wild music, strange clothes and cool guys. Narumi soon becomes a rock-enthusiast too, and goes with Mari to all the concerts and meets all the rock stars, including Ichirou, the lead singer from Mari’s favorite band, ‘7th Gate’ and Kyousuke, the lead singer of a rival band, ‘Misfit’.

The story follows Narumi as she learns more about Japanese visual rock bands, finds herself attracted to Ichirou, and at odds with Kyousuke.
